const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        term: {
          "user.id": "kimchy",
        },
      },
      filter: {
        term: {
          tags: "production",
        },
      },
      must_not: {
        range: {
          age: {
            gte: 10,
            lte: 20,
          },
        },
      },
      should: [
        {
          term: {
            tags: "env1",
          },
        },
        {
          term: {
            tags: "deployed",
          },
        },
      ],
      minimum_should_match: 1,
      boost: 1,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
